value: Q: How to find all pairs in an array of integers whose sum is equal to the given number?

def find(n, len, number):
 print("Pairs whose sum is : ", number)
 for i in range(len):
  for j in range(i, len):
   if (n[i] + n[j]) == number:
    print(n[i], n[j])

n = [10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 17, 18, 19]

# Take sum as input from user
number = 30

# print array
print("Array= ", n)

# call function find
find(n, len(n), number)
